overview: Meet Kipper, a loveable dog with a big imagination! 5 tail-wagging adventures!: The Umbrella Tiger is going fishing, but Kipper doesn't have a fishing rod. Instead, Kipper uses an umbrella that carries him to a new adventure! The Seaside Kipper and Tiger plan a relaxing day at the beach. When Tiger is stranded at sea, it's Kipper to the rescue! The Rainbow Puddle Kipper meets a magic frog at the end of the rainbow and is granted three wishes! What will he wish for? The Paddling Pool A paddling pool is the perfect place for Kipper to cool off on a hot day-until the weather changes! Big Owl's Bath When Big Owl gets dirty, Kipper gives him a bath. It's good clean fun until a windy day muddies the waters!
title: Kipper - Water Play
